    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4581</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Celebrations</string>
            <string language="es">Celebraciones</string>
            <string language="ga">Ceiliúradh</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Feiern</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Célébrations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Celebrations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Celebrazioni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εορτασμοί</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Discussion lesson on when and how we should celebrate new life stages, year stages and sacraments.</string>
            <string language="es">Lección para hablar sobre cuándo y cómo deberíamos celebrar las etapas de los nacimientos, etapas del año y los sacramentos.</string>
            <string language="ga">Ceacht plé ar an gcaoi agus an uair ar cheart dúinn staideanna nua saoil, staideanna bliana agus sacraimintí a cheiliúradh.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Religion</string>
            <string language="es">Religión. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Reiligiún</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diskussion Lektion an wenn und wie wir neue 
Lebenstadien, Jahrstadien und Sakramente feiern sollten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Leçon de discussion en fonction quand et comment 
nous devrions célébrer de nouvelles étapes de la vie, étapes 
d'année et sacrements.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lição da discussão sobre quando e como nós 
devemos comemorar estágios novos da vida, estágios do ano e 
sacraments.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lezione di discussione sopra quando e come 
dovremmo celebrare le nuove fasi di vita, le fasi di anno ed i 
sacraments.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μάθημα συζήτησης επάνω όταν και πώς πρέπει να 
γιορτάσουμε τα νέα στάδια ζωής, τα στάδια έτους και τα 
μυστήρια.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Religion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Religion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Religião</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Religione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
